channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Diseased tree?, 1st September
item.description:
Is this tree diseased? There is one on each side of the road and a large one further down by the bridge. Looks like itâ€™s spreading. Only August, leaves brown and falling and suffering from large spots and shoots look slimy.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 69, Moorend Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Kerbs and Channels problem, 1st September
item.description:
Give and take 28 days please lift an relay x1 300x150x30mm kerb stone stats required number 2 (CW Edge Kerbing & Channels)
